bill.title: Decriminalization of marijuana. Decriminalizes possession of 10 grams or less of marijuana and makes it a Class C infraction. Specifies that the civil penalty for possession of 10 grams or less of marijuana must be at least $100 but may not exceed $200, and provides for distribution of the funds. Establishes a defense to dealing in marijuana, hashish, or hash oil if the defendant delivered 10 grams or less with no expectation of consideration.

history.action: First reading: referred to Committee on Courts and Criminal Code
